      • getLocations

        java.util.List<Location> getLocations(java.lang.String orderByInsertionDate,
                                      java.lang.Integer numberDaysToLookBack)
                               throws AppException
        Parameters:
        orderByInsertionDate - - if set, it represents the order by criteria (ASC or DESC) for displaying locations
        numberDaysToLookBack - - if set, it represents number of days to look back for locations, null
        Returns:
        list with locations corresponding to search criteria
        Throws:
        AppException
